review_text: Wonderful home to stay! Worked great for us as we were in town for a wedding!
This place had everything we needed and then some. The bed were super comfortable and the kitchen was well equipped. WE had a great time and truly enjoyed this peaceful neighborhood.
Great place

We had a nice, comfortable stay at Mary’s place while in town visiting family. The house had everything we needed: comfy beds, good WiFi for our younger son to do a bit of remote work, kitchen with the extras we needed to prep our own meals. The neighborhood was quiet and a nice place to go for a walk. I’m not sure when all 4 of us will be back for a visit, but we’d definitely stay there again.
Very quiet place close to everything in town.
great place to stay
Me and my coworkers have used this house for several work trips, and it works great for us! The house accommodates all of our needs, and Mary is a great host.
cozy beds
House is as shown, and it met all of our needs. Mary was good at communicating everything we needed to know for our stay!
Enjoyed stay

We booked the home over the Christmas holiday. The house was very comfortable and met all of our needs. Up to eight of my family members were able to gather together and have space to sleep. It snowed during our stay, and the driveway was cleared, which was a welcome surprise. It was a wonderful stay, and we'd definitely return in the future.
Great spot, pictures are as described. Plenty of room for the whole family,

Mary was a pleasure to work with! Mary was responsive and if I did have any questions I know she would have been right there to answer them. Check out was super easy and simple as well! We were able to use the garage which was very convenient! All n' all a lovely stay.
Worked great for our trip would be happy to come again.

Our stay at Mary’s place was excellent! It was great for our family to explore the area and in close proximity to Homestead National Park. Also, there were toys and games in the house that the kids played.

Five of us stayed here. Very comfortable and fulfilled all of our needs. Well stocked with everything we needed including Keurig coffee maker. Much more comfortable than a hotel stay. We would stay here again.

We came to Beatrice for a wedding and did not want to stay in a hotel. Her place was absolutely perfect. Large rooms, comfy beds, comfortable family room to work at the large table or sit and watch TV. Great Wi-Fi and stocked kitchen. It is very close to restaurants and the neighborhood was great to walk with sidewalks and lovely homes. We would definitely stay here again!
lovely home was a very comfortable stay 10 outta 10 would recommend
Wonderful place to stay!
We had a great stay. Plenty of room and very clean
We had an amazingly relaxing stay at Mary's place. Enjoyed getting out of the city. So peaceful. Everything was perfect, clean, and convenient. We will definitely come back. Thank you so much!
this house was perfect and spacious for our needs. Mary was responsive and met all our needs. we will be back

It is a nice house with plenty of room for 8 people. However odd it seams, my favorite thing about it is the selection of mattresses. As someone with a bad back, mattress selection is important for me. There are four beds and they all have different levels of firmness. No matter your firmness preference, there is likely a bed in the house that will work for you. The house is clean, the neighborhood is quiet, it’s easy to find, and it is very private
We came to our son's wedding, Mary's house was cozy and comfortable. Mary is a great host and very attentive, and we highly recommend her place to stay.

Nice, cozy home. Love the neighborhood. Nice amount of Sq footage and neatly decorated. If you're a light sleeper, I don't recommend being the one who sleeps in the basement because if anyone is walking around upstairs it's very noticeable.
Great place to stay. Had everything we needed for our stay!
I would highly recommend it
We had a great stay for our 35 year graduation reunion. Mary was very responsive and accommodating.
Warm and cozy home
It was nice and way better than staying at a hotel.
It’s wonderful place I really love it I came to know my granddaughter we stay all together in the house I recommend it

It was so nice to have a place to stay for my wedding that was not a hotel room. So easy to find and such a nice place with lots of room. There was plenty of room for the girls and I to get ready and it worked really really well! The heat didn't want to work on Saturday and Mary was responsive and send someone to come and fix it and it was warm when we got back!! Great place to stay!!!
This lady was super nice lady my guys did some violation there and she communicate with me we work through them she was very easy to work with I would definitely recommend her as a great host.
very nice home, would stay again.
Mary was very accomodating and easy to work with. The house was very homey and everything looked and felt great! Would recommend to anyone if you need a place in Beatrice stay here!!
Awesome home that was comfortable to sleep 8 people!

Accommodating little house! Perfect for 2 couples, a grandma and 3 teens to relax comfortably!
This house is great for groups or families to stay. Plenty of space and great amenities. The garage and sun room worked great for our group to stage our gear.
Mary was great to deal with! We were in town with my inlaws for a wedding. There were two bedrooms on the main floor and two in the basement which worked out great for us. Very nice place!
The house was perfect for our family's needs. We will definitely stay again when we are back in Beatrice.
Awesome stay! Met our expectation fully and would stay every time we visited the area!
We had a great time. Comfy beds & clean. 2 bedrooms are down a steep set of stairs.
We absolutely loved our stay! The house was very clean! The location is great and the neighbors are friendly! Mary’s quick communication was absolutely fantastic! We would definitely stay again!

Mary was so helpful with her quick responses to questions. The house was very clean, the beds were comfortable and check-in was so easy! The k-cups and creamer were so nice to have our first morning there . I hadn't thought to pack anything like that for this unexpected trip so it saved me from an early morning trip to the grocery!!
My family and I had a wonderful stay and next time in town visiting family would love to stay again. Wonderful location and great accommodations!!
Mary was quick to respond to any issues we had while staying. The house was clean and comfortable. Nice location

Mary's communication was excellent. She was very thorough and very quick to respond to any questions I had. The house was in a great neighborhood. It was well appointed with clean, fresh towels and toiletries.

For a farm in Nebr, it has plenty of trees and wildlife that provides privacy and serenity. Enjoyed taking walks and working outside on the deck which is usually has trees shading it most of the time. Beatrice (city) is close by (4 miles) which is very nice. Close access to Walmart, and local restaurants, and fast food eating establishments. The owner was very responsive to my questions or needs that arose during our stay.

This house was a beautiful excape from the city life We were in town for work and this was the place. Kevin made sure we had everything we needed including drinks in the fridge for our arrival. Kevin's was an amazing host. I would definitely recommend this house for our future jobs.
Kevin was a responsive and thoughtful host. This experience was far better than we would have had at a motel/hotel in town.

We had a great stay here. It is in a very pleasant area just outside of Beatrice. Close to the town but also far enough away to be on your own. Communication was excellent and we will definitely be booking here if we come to Beatrice again.
This was a very nice home. In the rural area and posed a quiet spot. The home is a little small, but overall worked for our purposes. Would stay here again.
Nice, peaceful small house conveniently located near Homestead NP. The decor is a little dated but not a problem for a one-night stay. Access was super easy and everything was clean and worked fine.
Great place! Felt like I was staying at my grandma‘s house. Will stay there again.
Nice little place. Comfortable beds
Quiet and quaint, cute little cottage. Had everything we needed and a great back porch.
Nice place. Quite small, but was adequate for the two nights that we needed in the area.
We are so happy we found this place! It is the perfect size for a small family - comfortable and convenient with nice outdoor space. It is very close to a national park which is a great bonus.

This little cottage was exactly what I'd hoped for on a long road trip. We had our own private kitchen, bath, living room, deck, and bedrooms. We got in somewhat late, and though the owner's place was the house next door, we did not need to disturb them to get in. The beds were covered in beautiful, country quilts and were SO comfortable. The bathrooms had lots of soft, fluffy towels. The kitchen had everything we needed. And on a hot August day, the air conditioning was much appreciated. Thank you so much for the oasis in the miles and miles of corn and pavement in our day!

This place is perfect for a visit to the National Czech Festival in Wilber, like we did. It would also be perfect for a simple getaway from the cares of the world. The house was comfortable, the location quiet, and the surroundings beautiful. If you are looking for peace and quiet, this is the place.
It was a girl’s weekend. Perfect drive from where we were during the day. Great place to sleep, so peaceful with comfy beds. Very comfortable!
Needed a place to stay a couple of days in Beatrice. Quite, comfortable, and clean
Easy check in and out, and quick response time!
This quiet little cottage was a great place to rest and relax between softball games.
Very cozy place. About a 45 minute bicycle ride to town.
Very nice, quiet place, much better than hotel.
Nice quiet place in the country for me and my son. We had meetings in the area and this property worked great for our business trip. Clean, quiet and a short distance from Beatrice.

Quaint, lovely, authentic cottage that suited our needs perfectly. The cottage was quiet and a nice walk to the Homestead museum. We would stay there again if ever in Beatrice , NE. About 4-5 miles from the main part of town. A lot of local shops as well as McDonalds, Walmart etc.
Cozy and comfortable with peaceful surroundings. Comfortable beds!

Troy responded in timely manner to my questions. House was easy to find along with a peaceful countryside surrounding. The shower made a very loud screeching noise when in use and the house was a bit dusty, but other then that we weren't there long. I didn't understand why it cost more for 4 people compared to 1, but I assume that's a airbnb thing. It was a cute, little country house that reminded me of visiting my grandma as a child.
Great place. Would stay again!

Our total experience from checkin to checkout was more than we expected. The host was very responsive to any needs we may have had within minutes. I would highly recommend that anyone staying within the area, strongly consider contacting Airbnb to book a stay at this location.
Wonderful place! Quiet, clean & wonderful beds!!!!!!
Such a cute place! We loved it.

While we weren't even there for a whole 12 hours, we enjoyed such a peaceful night at the little cottage. It was peaceful, calm, clean, and the beds were extremely comfortable! Not to mention they were extremely easy to contact and very friendly.
I would HIGHLY reccommend staying here to anyone in the area.
We keep returning, so that says it all!
Very nice place to stay.

We are from Orange Texas. Mr. Troy made us feel very comfortable. Very friendly and forth coming. Gave us 💯 privacy. Anytime we would be ask where we were staying while in Beatrice and we tell them they always had great things to say abt Mr. Troy Would highly recommend staying at (The Cottage at Oak Aven )
We had a great night sleep! It was so peaceful & a lovely place to stay. Thank you!
Everything was great!
My 3rd stay here—lovely as usual! Enjoyed walking to Homestead National Historical Park a couple of mornings before the weather was too hot. Such a great local spot!
The hosts were quick to communicate and easy to work with! The house is charming and really convenient to the national park.
Great little cottage.

Had a family reunion in the area and this was a great place for my little family of 3 to stay. Make sure if you have a vehicle that you don’t want to drive on dirt roads- always take the route that comes in from the south of the location to limit that. Otherwise it was very pleasant and very relaxing. Beautiful views and quiet.
Great country stay with beautiful surroundings and peaceful sounds. We slept great and would definitely stay again!

Charming cottage in a rural area made for a peaceful and restful night. We only stayed one night, and the cottage felt homey as soon as we walked in. I slept better than I had in days, and in the morning enjoyed my tea on the porch, listening to the birds sing. The hosts responded immediately to questions during our stay. Highly recommend!

This was the second stay at the cottage. Another nice (though short) visit. This time my husband was with me, and we walked a couple of times at Homestead National Historical Park. Lots of birds songs made the walking extra sweet.
Nice little house in quiet countryside. Everything was as listed. Very clean. Would stay again.

I had a lovely, cozy stay. The house had everything I needed, and it was so nice to be close to Homestead National Historical Park (one of my favorite places to walk when I'm in Beatrice). I'm looking forward to the next stay (later this month)!

My stay here was very pleasant. Beds are comfortable, house is clean,, the kitchen has most of what you might need, there's satellite TV, and the area is quiet. Homestead National Historic Park is less than a mile away. The country road past the house makes a pleasant walk. My friends were staying in the campground, so I was able to walk to it to visit their campfire. I'll definitely stay here again when I'm in the area.
quiet peaceful stay, close to town
Troy, Selma, & Jessica were easy to work with. Their place was close to Homestead National Historic Park, clean and homey.
The hosts are wonderful to work with for this nice and clean place to stay.
Great location, quiet and out of the way. Great hosts, never a problem or issue
A quite, clean, cozy and comfortable
Nice, clean secluded cottage. Minutes from town.

The Cottage is a great relaxing place to escape. With all the amenities a home has. The place was fantastic, clean, comforting and with washer/dryer. This place beats any hotel. Wifi. Cable TV, outdoor grill, serene surroundings with peace and quiet. I will be staying here again. I recommend this place for anyone staying around Beatrice. There'snot a hotel around that can touch this place. Affordable actually cheaper than a hotel room. Comes with everything a home has
The place is located in serene and quiet wooded area, the house has comfortable and homey feel to it.
Very serene! Love staying at the cottage. Very well stocked and comfortable!

This home was exceptionally clean. It is in a secluded location just minutes from anything you may need in town. A group of four stayed here and it meet our needs in every way. The home is a two bedroom with living room, shower, and a kitchen. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here in the future.
The cottage is a perfect spot if you want quiet comfort and great hosts. Close enough to town if needed but far enough out to enjoy nature and quiet. You won’t be disappointed.
Clean quiet and comfortable, extremely easy to work with.
It's a lovely cottage and you'll enjoy the scenery too!
Great cottage in Beatrice allowed for an enjoyable overnight. I would stay here again.
The cottage is charming! It is very peaceful and quiet. The home has everything a person needs for a relaxing stay!
This a very quiet, comfortable and clean place. It feels like you came home to your grandmother’s, but without any distractions! Remote and peaceful but close to town!

I couldn’t of been more happy with this cozy little place! If you forget something.. it’s most likely there for you to use!
So comfortable! So clean!
We definitely will be back!!
Coming from the Phoenix, it was delightful to enjoy the country weather, snow and critters around. Saw some beautiful plump Cardinals, a squirrel larger than my fat cat and lots of squirrels!

The Cottage is a lovely location if you are planning to visit the Homestead National Monument. The Cottage offers outstanding value: two private bedrooms, a full kitchen, television, and lots of small touches that make it very welcoming. I greatly enjoyed the week I stayed here while visiting my family in the Beatrice and DeWitt area. Very quiet and peaceful--a perfect retreat. I'm looking forward to staying here the next time I visit Nebraska. I highly recommend it to other travelers.
Great house. Super clean very comfortable
Very clean, comfortable and spacious accommodations. The cottage had everything we needed with a well stocked kitchen. Would highly recommend it.
The perfect little cottage for a getaway.
We would be happy to stay here again, and it will be our first choice if we get back to the area. The house is cozy and charming, clean and well appointed.
Quick responses, clean place, great hosts, would recommend to other!

Easy check in, good privacy. The place was clean but had an odd smell that was not easily disbursed. It’s a small place but had everything you need including a full size fridge and stove, and directv. It’s decorated to the time of the cottage’s age: 1940’s which was a nice touch.
Awesome hosts! Wonderful stay!
Exactly what we were hoping for - quiet and no hassle comfort. Thanks!
Great place and great hosts!
Quiet...clean...quaintly old-fashioned decor. Very close to Homestead National Monument. We could have walked there if it weren't raining.
Troy, Selma & Jessica's place felt right at home while working in the area for an extended time. Anytime I'm in the area I'll be looking for their place first.

The Cottage was absolutely a wonderful place to stay! My colleagues and I were in a pinch to find housing for the weekend and Troy and his family helped out immensely. The communication was great and the house itself was very cozy. We all would highly recommend it!
Peaceful and quiet. Made it much easier to relax after work.
Quaint and quiet cottage.
Troy, Selma, And Jessica’s cottage is cozy and charming. Made for the perfect place to hole up to catch up on work. Comfy and peaceful, away from it all yet close enough.
Quiet and peaceful. Quaint and interesting. I felt relaxed here.
Great place! Private and free.
Very nice home, in a good location. Clean and it had everything we needed and then some.

Best place to stay in Beatrice. Cozy, quiet, and just wonderful hosts that make you feel right at home. This is exactly why AirBnB was invented, to showcase places and hospitality just like this. Will return again and would recommend to anyone looking for a home experience rather than a hotel.
Fanstastic Air BnB provider.

Being from the country ourselves, we thoroughly enjoyed our visit at The Cottage at Oak Aven Acres. The back deck was a great place to be with our morning coffee! Everything was nice and clean. There was even cold water in refrigerator and all kinds of spices to cook with! We had everything we needed for a great stay! We couldn't be happier! We hope to be back again next year.
Thanks, Troy, Selma and Jessica!
A really nice, quiet, private country home. Nicely kept up and decorated just like Grandma's house. like One of the nicest, most unique places I have ever stayed :)
Very clean! Quiet! Perfect for us! We need to come back and see the Homestead National Monument!

The hosts were very accommodating to us on a short notice! We were stuck overnight in Beatrice and all the hotels were booked for the night so we resorted to Airbnb. The hosts were able to get everything ready for us within an hour of booking. Everything was very nice and homey, comfortable and quiet!
Clean & quiet.
If you’re needing a place to stay in Beatrice, I would recommend this cottage/home. Surrounded by trees with lots of birds. Very quiet. We very much enjoyed staying there.
The cottage was adorable it was like staying at my beloved Mimi’s house! Too cute!
Feels like home, warm and cozy with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Wifi and internet connections work well, too.

We have stayed here several times, so we knew it's comfortable and convenient. We had ~8 inches of snow overnight, and Troy came by to scoop the steps and walkways, greatly appreciated. Nice little kitchen to cook up some spaghetti and meatballs. Great sleeping in a spacious bed with quilts, waking up to the birds singing. Very relaxing place!
Great place away from the hustle and bustle. Just what we needed!

Wonderful communication with Host. Quaint little cottage away from city noise. Beatrice is a nice community but don't try to eat somewhere between 2 and 5 on a Saturday (certainly not the host's fault).
The comment was made that this was like sleeping in someone else's grandma's house. And I suppose that is what it is.
Seriously it was a great value and a great house in the country to stay at. I wish I could have done a long weekend here and had some time to sit on the porch and watch the grass grow. We loved it.
The wifi wasn't super fast I think is my only complaint if I had to have a complaint.
Thanks again.
The house was quaint and cozy. Very clean and well equipped. The hosts were very responsive and accommodating. Would definitely stay again!
Very clean, quiet place to stay. Will definitely stay again when we are in the area.
Amazing property with even more Amazing owners! Great experience, cant wait to come back.
Mary was very friendly and responsive and we really enjoyed our stay!
great place!!
We enjoyed our stay ver much, Mary was very accommodating to all our needs and made sure we had everything we needed.

We stayed 5 nights for a hunting trip. Very nice accomodations and beatiful sunrises. Host is super nice and helpful. Nice commercial kitchen, clean bedrooms and sitting area, plenty of eating area. If you are interesting in pheasant hunting, they can set you up with a really nice hunt, too.
Mary and Troy went out of their way to make sure their place was perfect for our group of hunters. Can’t say enough great things. We will be back for sure! Thanks again Mary and Troy!!!
Mary was very responsive and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Will definitely be back!
Great place to stay!
Mary was very accommodating. Thank you!

I absolutely loved my stay here. So much room inside and out. Peaceful. Quiet. Stars galore! A wonderful kitchen! The stove is one of those industrial stoves, amazing! Great water pressure in the bathrooms! The hunting deco was loved! The beds are so comfortable. It is an amazing place to stay! Highly recommend!
We always enjoy our stay. We come back every year.
Such a peaceful place
Super nice cabin, very cozy. Mary was a great host, super friendly and quick to respond. Would definitely recommend this cabin for large groups.

Our entire family enjoyed the stay. We were in Beatrice for a birthday party and needed a place large enough for the entire family. Easy to find. Easy instructions. Great host, and the rental was actually nicer than the pictures. Thank you!
We had a wedding at a venue a few miles away. It was an excellent place to stay. Beatrice is about 15 minutes away.
Absolutely loved it. Mary and her husband were very nice and have an awesome place ! Can’t wait to go back and will make this a yearly stay ! Was very relaxing

The home is exactly like the pictures. We had a brief stay and everything seemed clean and worked well. Mary the host was very responsive and checked to make sure we had everything we needed. The kitchen was great and we enjoyed playing pool.
This was a perfect option for us as we were there for a softball tournament and the girls could spend time together in the great room.

The host was great and responsive. It was easy to check in, and the instructions and directions were very clear. I had to schedule last minute and got a response right away. I enjoyed my stay and if I'm ever back in the area will book again!
We didnt get to spend as much time as we wanted to, but we enjoyed out time. Definitely will try to come back.
Enjoyed are stay! Thanks so much for having us!
Great place and wonderful hosts!
Really cool place to stay! Beautiful property and accommodations.

Great place! Very spacious. Great host! Communicated well.
Best AirBnb in Beatrice area.
This is the third time I have stayed here. It's a perfect place with lots of room and amenities. I will certainly be staying here again in the future!

Very responsive to any questions we had. Checked in to make sure we had everything or if anything else was needed. Nice and quiet area and very peaceful. Plenty of room to spread out with a bigger group
Very clean and quiet area !

Mary was very helpful and quick to respond. We had everything that we needed...and a pool table! 😊
The views were beautiful!
We didn’t fully utilize this property for what it’s capable of, but found it comfortable and clean. Nice place to stay.
Mary’s hunting lodge was absolutely a great place to stay, I would definitely recommend and stay again.
Had a perfect stay. Spacious, clean, great hosts.
Mary is a wonderful host! Very rustic and homey. The views were gorgeous! Definitely will stay again!!!
Great place to stay. Affordable, convenient, and has lots of amenities. We have stayed there twice and will stay again if we need a place. Much better than any motel.
Excellent place to stay when you have a large group.
This was a fun stay in the country. Everything was clean and Mary checked with us on arrival to make sure we had everything we needed.
Great beds! Thanks for a great stay would absolutely stay again

This cabin was everything we needed, we came down for the Solstice Gravel Bike race in Beatrice. We enjoyed being able to come back to the countryside to relax. Kitchen is fully stocked, there is coffee, spices, microwave, and Mary offered to use their grill!
Mary was incredible, she brought us hair conditioner and hair spray when we forgot ours at home. Loved the view of the country side and being out of the city. Highly recommend, we'll be back next year for the Gravel race for sure. Thanks again Mary!
this place was amazing for large family gathering
We had a great stay. We will definitely be back.
Great place, especially for hunters. Everything you need for a fun and restful time.
A wonderful place to stay. It can accommodate a lot of people, and they are family and pet friendly.
Great place to stay. Awesome hosts!
Great get away spot for a weekend cycling trip on the Homestead trail. Lots of room, spotless, and excellent hosts.

Great place to stay in southeastern Nebraska! Beautiful, quiet and peaceful property located just a mile off the highway. This was a perfect place for our family to stay while we were in the area for a family reunion. It was so much better than staying at a hotel! So clean and super easy check-in and check-out! Thanks Mary!!
Great place to stay.
Awesome stay!

An amazing place to restore. I stayed here for less than 24 hours- and it reset every fiber of my being!
The drive from Omaha was beautiful- highly recommend “skipping highways” and taking the scenic route! There’s nothing relaxing about I-80.
When I walked in, my first through was “wow I should’ve brought friends!” This space is LARGE!
The space is super clean, remarkably peaceful and as others have mentioned, the industrial kitchen is hard to beat.
I came with just my pup- and a desire to relax and unwind after too much time in the city during all this. The stars were incredible, the sunset over the fields was incredible…there is something so reassuring about an open sky and crops.
The bed in the master was so comfortable! This is an incredible Airbnb. Book it!
We always have a nice stay here. Plenty of room and host is very accommodating and responds quickly. So peaceful outside of town. Will return.

Accurate description, quiet and peaceful. Mary responded quickly to questions, was friendly and inviting. We were not hunting, but I could see this would be a perfect spot for this activity. I could hear pheasant in the tall grass. I was greeted by a lovely house wren singing every morning. Like I said, peaceful.
Very friendly and clean. Enjoyed our stay.
You can expect a very clean space and cold ac with a great place to shower and shoot some pool at the end of the day. It was a fantastic spot.
100% recommend! Wonderful place to stay

This was a great place to stay for a weekend family getaway from Omaha. The cabin/lodge is about a 15-min drive to the two trailheads that connect in Beatrice--the Chief Standing Bear Trail that extends into Kansas and the Homestead Trail that heads north to Lincoln. The nearby Homestead National Historical Park was also well worth a visit. The cabin/lodge also has great amenities--we especially enjoyed having access to a full kitchen, the pool table, and having plenty of space to spread out for family board games.
What a great place! We loved our stay! Everything was great!
great place great location great people

I would highly recommend this place to anyone who needs a place away from the hustle and bustle of the city to just relax . I loved the rustic hunting themed lodge and the sleeping quarters were perfect for the amount of guests . the kitchen was available for us to use and we were provided clean towels and washcloths. two bathrooms with two showers made it so convenient. the country setting and the history of the lodge made it a unique experience for everyone. I would highly recommend this place for the wonderful welcoming hospitality we received . anyone needing to stay and needing more than two beds. not set up for young children and the sleeping quarters are upstairs but still way more enjoyable than a hotel.
The place was very clean and quiet.

If i could give Mary's lodge a million stars...I most definitely would. Spacious, extremely comfortable, extremely clean, and Mary's communication is beyond expectations. Would recommend in a heartbeat.
Mary and Troy couldnt have been nicer to us. The place worked out perfect for our group. It had plenty of room for our gear and to spread out. I would absolutely stay there again.
Clean place. Well kept. Very responsive to needs. Worth the money
Mary is the best. Very clean and even left homemade cookies! :)

This was our second time staying here for Christmas with my family. It's so nice to have a vacation rental in this area. Everything was as expected. The layout works out really well for a family or a group.
A fabulous place to relax with everything you need for a great trip.
Very nice place to stay with family. It is quiet and relaxing with plenty of space to enjoy the outdoors.

This place is one for the books! I’ve stayed at a lot of airb&b’s and this place topped all of them. I was here on business with my crew and they loved having a pool table to play on after work. We worked nights and the owners stayed quiet all day while we slept. Much cheaper than hotels and bigger with everything you need to cook clean and wash clothing.
Good stay
Nice quiet place to stay
Great place to stay! Beautiful location and views! Loved everything about Mary's place from the beautiful pictures on the wall to the comfortable beds and cookies she left for us!
Mary was a great host. She's easily accessible if you need anything from her. And always quick to respond if you have any questions. I highly recommend staying here.
Definitely a great place to stay. Such a beautiful place and a beautiful setting: communication was amazing and we would definitely recommend staying here. We loved it!

Great place to stay whether you are hunting or just a family gathering. Very clean, and the host Troy and Mary are great. Not far out of Beatrice with the comforts of home. We will definitely be back.
Mary's place was perfect! Thank you so much!
Great location to where we needed to be!
Mary’s place was awesome. Beautiful views and we were even greeted with fresh cookies. Wish we could stay longer!

Really great experience staying here
The entire property was beautiful.

Mary greeted me and was very friendly and welcoming. The accommodations were great with anything I could have needed. This would be a perfect stay for both hunters or someone just passing through the area looking for a place to enjoy some peace and quiet during their stay.

My family and I enjoyed our stay. We were greeted by Todd and found accommodations to be clean, comfortable, and quiet. In addition to relaxing otherwise, it was fun to play pool as a family. We recommend as a great place to stay!

If you're looking for a quiet break from your rat-race, this lodge is just the place to get away and enjoy nature! There are so many amenities...everything you could need. If you have questions or need anything, Mary & Troy are right there to help!!!
Had a good time. Pretty cool hiking spots.
Wonderful host!

Cub Creek Hunting accommodations are well set up for hunters, but also a nice place to stay for families. Very convenient to Plymouth (5 miles), Dewitt (7 miles), Beatrice (10 miles), Diller (13 miles), Wilber (14 miles), etc. We came for Christmas and were able to visit family in the area, and have plenty of space to host at our rental, too. The downstairs space has a well-supplied kitchen, bathroom (with shower), living area and 2 round tables that is convenient and cozy even though shared with the hunting business. "The Loft" - A Novella by Daniel Brodecky
"Where are we supposed to park, on the street?" Lizzie said. "I guess anyplace is good, it's Wilber Hun", laughed Danny. Lizzie had a charm about her that honestly only he could probably understand. Perhaps it was because he was never very particular to begin with. "Maybe we are supposed to park by the garbage cans?", said Lizzie as she began to squeeze the Ford into the narrow space between the utility pole and the faded pink, blue and brown garbage cans that lined the rear of the building.
Outside they could hear faint speech, cars on the highway as they made their way down the dark alley towards the door. "Okay babe", said Lizzie. "You're better at this than I am.". Danny smiled, knowing she was right. He carefully entered the code on the entry handle keypad, turned the dial, and gently pressed the door. "Dammit!", Danny said. He tried again with as much luck. "Jesus let me do it", Lizzie sighed.
"To be continued..."

Judy was very helpful with points of interest in town, restaurants, and other things to do. We loved having coffee and breakfast on the patio in the mornings, and drinks by the fire at night. So peaceful. Already talking about when we can go back again!

This is a great place to get away from the city and unplug your cell phone computer and TV! The pond was a relaxing oasis! We enjoyed kayaking paddle boating and watching the sunrise! We also went into town where there were lots of local stores and restaurants! Our host Judy was the sweetest lady ever ,she had lots of local tips ! Don't get me started on the baked goods she made for breakfast ! Yummy 😋 We can't wait to book again !
Perfect little getaway!

Judy’s place was absolutely amazing. It was so well decorated and clean. The place sat right on a pond with wonderful sunsets. She thought of everything from extra toiletries to a essential oil diffuser. Not to mention, her cinnamon rolls and blueberry muffins were delicious. Overall, the place was fantastic and Judy was a joy to meet.

My husband and I loved our time at Judy and Larry’s camper next to the pond! We were looking for a place to get away from work for a few days to rest and relax and their place was perfect! So quiet, and the pond was beautiful! Judy was super hospitable and made us homemade muffins and cinnamon rolls and took the time to get to know us! Would highly recommend staying at the pond! The value is unmatched!
Great experience!

Staying at the pond was the exact getaway me and my boyfriend were looking for. I would highly recommend this to any nature lovers out there. We enjoyed fishing and using the paddle boat. The stars were so easy to see at night and the sunrise is beautiful over the pond!

Amazing place!
10/10 would recommend!
Great view!
Great little stop over while traveling cross country! Beautiful quiet place with wonderful hospitality. Felt like staying with family!

Due to COVID-19, my 9 year old son and I had to cancel both of our vacation plans. I found this gem and booked a few nights. It is just lovely. Perfect getaway in the country. Judy and Larry make it feel just like home. Paddle boating, grilling, outdoor fireplace and exploring the country. Judy recommenced several local spots that did not disappoint. And her lemon blueberry muffins are to die for. I’m sure we’ll be back again!

Our stay far exceeded our expectations and was by far the best Airbnb experience we’ve ever had. Judy was incredibly hospitable and the place was immaculate. The pond was beautiful, space was stylish, and Judy treated us like family. I can not recommend her enough. Book your stay and you won’t be disappointed!

This is the perfect place to simply get away and have a little camping experience. The camper is so nicely remodeled and so cute! It was very homey, clean, and unique. We will definitely be back if we are in the area! Judy is very friendly and accommodating.

The name is perfect! The Pond: A Country Retreat is exactly what it is and is such a perfect little getaway and escape from the hustle and bustle of every day life.
It is so peaceful and relaxing!
Great way to recharge!
Larry and Judy are incredibly hospitable and go above and beyond to make sure your stay is enjoyable. They are both very good salt of the earth people who make you feel welcome wanted and invited from the get go.
We will definitely include the Pond in future get aways!!!

What a relaxing experience we had at Judy's camper on the pond. Larry made a wonderful fire for us to enjoy our beautiful evening visiting on the patio enjoying frogs croaking and stars in the sky and just peace and quiet and surrounded by farmland. Judy makes All her guests homemade cinnamon rolls! ...custom ordered, with or with nuts and or raisins! She says, it is called air bnb so you should get breakfast. She has made a fabulous retreat by the pond. The camper looks as if it was decorated by Joanna Gaines, so cute! Totally enjoyed our stay and the hosts are such kind people.

This was a perfect weekend getaway for my husband and I with our 11-month old baby. The location is great for an escape from the hustle and bustle, but close enough to the small town of Beatrice for dinner/drinks/groceries.
Judy was very easy to communicate with both before and during our stay. The camper is right in their backyard, but they were very considerate of our privacy. Larry came down and started the fire for us both nights, and Judy was always nearby if we needed anything.
Despite being an old camper, it is very well maintained. Judy remodeled it last year and it is so cute! The air conditioner worked very well, and we had plenty of hot water. There was lots of storage space for our things. We felt like we had plenty of space, even with a portable crib set up in the living room area. Judy had the camper stocked with all the basic necessities for cooking and grilling (salt and pepper, oil, butter, foil, cooking untensils), and even provided s'mores fixings and a few snacks. She also baked delicious cinnamon rolls and muffins for breakfast, which she dropped of the night before to avoid waking us in the morning.
We used their propane grill one night and had no problems. The patio area is a shared space, so you will potentially have to share it with other Airbnb guests if someone is staying in the Cabin, as well. We very much enjoyed sitting out on the patio and taking the paddle boat out on the pond. We applied bug spray before going out, but never noticed any mosquitoes.
This was one of the best Airbnb experiences we've had, and I know Judy strives to make that true for all of her guests. We definitely recommend!

Paradise that would be the best way to describe this stay!! Such a cute camper with everything you need! We loved sitting by the pond and fishing. We took the paddle boat out and had a blast. At night Larry started us a fire and we roasted smores!! We will be staying again for sure!! Such a great escape!!!
The Pond was amazing and so was the host. Judy was great. She has thought of everything to make you feel right at home. We truly enjoyed our stay and it will not be our last!!
Judy is a great host. The camper and patio are perfect for weekend get away.

Judy was an incredible host! She thought of everything to make our stay comfortable and a home away from home. She was friendly and provided lots of options of things to do while there and what's in the area. The homemade goods were over the top! You will not regret booking with Judy!
Staying at Judy's was like being at home. Cinnamon rolls and apple muffins to start your day. Drinks by the pond with a fire at night. We will definitely go back.

Everything was perfect.
Judy is so thoughtful, not only making sure you will have everything to make your comfortable but also going out of her way to make your time at her home special. We were lucky to be able to stay in the camper on our honeymoon and were greeted by a special note, bottle of nice wine, and chocolates. Not to mention the fresh cut flowers, snacks, supplies to make smores, and she makes the best homemade cinnamon rolls.
The camper is clean, comfortable, and well stocked with anything you may need. The patio area and pond are a little slice of heaven and I wish we could have spent more time on our trip. Hoping we will get a chance to return for many more visits to this special place where we were treated like family.

This was a first experience for us, staying in an RV...we really enjoyed the well decorated and cozy atmosphere and the view of the pond is such a calming feature. We took it all in...paddle boating, fishing, walk around the pond, grilling, and wine on the patio with a beautiful night sky. Judy is delightful.

Judy’s place was perfect for my wife and I. Judy was very welcoming and had the answers to all our questions. We felt at home our whole stay. The fire pit her husband fired up for us on the cool night was the perfect touch. We definitely record this stay!

We stayed in the Camper, enjoyed a fire built in the outdoor fireplace by Larry. Had family join us for smores. The cinnamon buns were delicious. Enjoyed kayaking on the pond in the morning. Very nice. Clean camper. Great hosts. :)
We loved staying here! Private getaway on a lovely pond. Highly recommend!
Judy's camper is cute, clean and comfy! We had a nice breakfast by the pond- good coffee and the best homemade cinnamon rolls ever!
Judy & Larry were fantastic hosts! They were so hospitable and kind. Their cozy camper was a perfect weekend getaway from the city for us.

We had a wonderful time at The Pond! Peaceful and relaxing atmosphere, and very comfortable. Judy went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and she even helped me get in touch with a babysitter so my husband and I could have a date night out. The breakfast cinnamon rolls and banana nut muffins were delicious, and we were able to easily cook our meals in the camper and also on the gas grill on the patio. The camper felt very spacious to me, although a very tall person might feel cramped. I caught several little bluegill and three nice catfish over our stay. Our 14 month old daughter loved the swing set outside and it was nice that the drawers are child-resistant, so she could walk around in the camper without too much worry about what she could get into. But be sure to latch the door properly!! She took a tumble out the door (100% my mistake) but thankfully it was a fairly soft landing and she was not hurt. All in all a fantastic value and we would definitely like to come back sometime.

A great place to stay! Very helpful and quick in responses. They were very kind enough to start a fire for our smores and bake cinnamon roles for breakfast. We were able to also paddle boat around their pond. Definitely recommend for a getaway to the outdoors.

What a beautiful retreat! We enjoyed an afternoon of fishing off the dock, reading on the patio and relaxing by firelight in the evening. Everything was clean and well taken care of, and Judy was so hospitable and welcoming. It was such a fun getaway!
Easy to find. Clean interior.

Such hospitality! Very quaint accommodations and everything was so thought out and clean.
We were served delicious rolls and muffins with fruits for breakfast. Such a nice touch to start the day.
The patio is so peaceful and the morning view of the sunrise is worth waking for. If you have time take a stroll all the way around the pond. You might be pleasantly surprised by deer.
Campers have quirks so listen to what Judy has to say when you get there and you will enjoy your stay. We weren’t able to get the stove lit so if you want to use it be sure to ask about it ahead of time. We had other things to eat so we just didn’t pursue Judy about it.

The moment you arrive, you are greeted with a warm smile and southern hospitality; feel like family. Judy and her husband Larry have true servants hearts. The space is immaculate and cozy to say the least. Do not worry about the small stuff, Judy has already thought of it. All. Of. It.! Fresh baked cinnamon roles, dishes, toiletries, trash bags, tin foil, baggies, games to play, radio, welcome note, book to share your memories with her, lighted pathway, all the makings for s’mores , fresh cut flowers, and the list goes o & on. I don’t want to spoil it for you. Think of it as you are going to YOUR other home....amazing!! That’s just the beginning... Prepare yourself to be lulled by Mother Nature’s concertos in stereo at dusk. You will have access to front rows seats as you sit back and watch the dancers perform on the water. While the stars and fireflies steal the show; indescribable. Don’t just take my word for it, experience it for yourself! You won’t want to leave!!!
P.S. Thank you Judy & Larry for an absolutely amazing and relaxing experience at The Pond.
It's such a cute space.
We loved our stay with Judy! It was easy to find, rural enough to be peaceful but close enough to town to head there for meals. It was exactly what we needed!

This was the PERFECT place for my significant other and I to get away for a night to celebrate his birthday and our anniversary. The camper was very clean and neat. The inside was more spacious than I had expected. Plenty of space for the two of us, we never felt cramped I there. The view of the pond over looking endless rolling hills at night was so beautiful, especially since there were so many fireflies beyond the pond it looked like glitter was erupting from the fields for hours. This is just the perfect cozy quiet and peaceful place to have a great time. We also caught TONS of fish in their stocked pond. Judy also recommended plenty of local restaurants and events in town for us to check out as well. She is an amazing host and her cinnamon rolls are delicious! Staying for just one night did not seem like enough, we will definitely be back!!

My wife and I stayed at The Pond on our way to Omaha. Judy met us upon our arrival and provided us with well-thought-out guidelines and recommendations for our stay. She was incredibly hospitable, and seems to have thought of everything a guest might require, including cookware, additional blankets, toiletries, and even items for making s’mores in their patio fireplace. The pond was lovely, and my wife and I enjoyed a trip on the water in their paddle boat, and spent some time lounging in the water-side patio. In addition to the cozy bed and incredible hospitality, Judy took the time to make fresh cinnamon buns, which were enjoyed as a nighttime snack, and as a morning meal. Truly a fantastic location and exceptional host.

My wife and I stayed at Judy’s place to celebrate our anniversary. We were welcomed with a bottle of wine and some chocolate. This was just the beginning of the fabulous hospitality we experienced. Judy made delicious cinnamon rolls for breakfast the first day and banana nut muffins for our second morning. We were offered a parking spot in their shop when there was a possibility of hail as well as entrance into their home if the storm got out of control. Thankfully it wasn’t anything major, and we were able to enjoy our stay. I would highly recommend a stay at the pond to anyone looking to unplug. We hope to return!

If you are looking for an escape from stresses of life please go see Judy and Larry! Their property offers a great opportunity to enjoy nature and the outdoors. The cute little camper was a perfect accommodation and the patio provides a wonderful spot to grill and enjoy the pond. Loved fishing, bird watching and letting the croaking frogs sing us to sleep!

In considering staying here, don’t think camper, think cottage. We ended up in Beatrice, NE in a completely random way and had to change our tent camping plans due to weather. We ended up staying in this cute camper next to a pond. Judy has redone the inside so it looks like a little cottage with a kitchen, sitting area and bedroom. Judy and her husband are warm hosts and there are lovely touches including an outdoor sitting area and baked goods. It’s close to town and interesting historic sites. Five stars without a doubt!

This listing is exactly what it says it is. It's a camper in the middle of Nebraska by a pond.
And it is fantastic.
For my wife and I, it was the perfect place to unplug and relax.

My Father and I had a great time Mrs. Judy is awesome and should probably think about opening her own bakery. Best cinnamon rolls and muffins I have ever had. The place was beautiful and they made you feel like family!!! We will definitely be staying again if we are in the area!!!
Great weekend getaway very comfy and homey. Host was so nice and helpful and make sure you are taken care of

This was our first experience with Airbnb. Judy is a wonder. She greeted us kindly and made our stay special.
She made us these delicious cinnamon rolls!
This location is quiet and so relaxing!
We highly recommend her as a super host!
Judy is so kind! She made homemade cinnamon rolls for me and even brought some taco soup for me on a night I was working a little late. Would be more than happy to stay here again in the future!

If you’re looking for a place to get away, this is it. Great place to stay and even better people. Judy was nice enough to make us breakfast every morning as well! Very clean, very quick to respond, and a relaxing stay! Will definitely visit again if I am ever back in the area!

Highly recommend couldn’t ask for a better host or place to stay!!! The view the pond the out door kitchen the deck I could go on and on about what I loved about staying here but most of all we met two great people They made us feel like part of the family. I will definitely be back even if it’s just to visit. Thank y’all sooo much!!!

This is the place to stay to get away from it all. Location is perfect, the camper is comfortable, the fish are plentiful, (make sure you don't sit your pole down they will pull them in! ha ha ha) Very gracious host who truly takes care of her guests

The pictures that Judy has posted don't do this place justice, it is absolutely gorgeous!! It is a great location in the country yet not to far from town at all with great roads the entire way. This was a perfect experience for my family and will definitely go back! And the cinnamon rolls for breakfast were just icing on the cake!!

If you're looking for a simple, private space, which is a great value; you will enjoy staying with Judy! She was always prompt to answer our questions and respond to our requests. if you don't want to drive on gravel, you won't like the location; but being off the "beaten path" is what provided the view of the night sky and sound of the creatures at night. My wife loved the fresh flowers and the patio by the pond was a comfortable space. Judy provided information about the area and clear instructions about using the camper, without being condescending. We appreciated her hospitality and good humor.
Judy’s place has lots of space to kick back and relax. It is just minutes aware from what ever your doing in town.

We had a very nice stay and would recommend it to anyone! Very clean and well equipped space, nice outdoor seating area by pond amid the quiet and beautiful cornfields. Judy is a great host - fresh baked goods and other special touches made our stay very special.

Great location for us. We were on a road trip and wanted to see the Homestead National Monument which was great and less than 10 minutes from the house. Judy was a great hostess and the space in the main house was lovely. We highly recommend.

Judy went over and beyond. Fresh baked cookies on arrival. Warm muffin for breakfast. She knew we were leaving early for a baseball tournament so she had a care package and coffee in a to go cup. The property was beautiful. The pond and patio was a great place to relax. Location was great. Very close to Beatrice.
Camper was as listed. Very clean, soft sheets. We hope to come back soon!

Very nice at first was sweet and didn’t even get bothered that we needed to add a guest. However, was no very nice when we ran into the issue of having a dog we did make that mistake of not seeing the no pet rule it said we would get back half of our money back but was not willing to work with us it left us stranded in a state we have never been to and had to sleep in a van for a night because nothing was open in the area until the next day. Very nice at first but will not work with you if anything happens THEY WILL NOT HELP YOU OUT IF LAST MINUTE THINGS HAPPEN. I didn’t even want half maybe even just 1/4 would be fine!
